title: Capsule CEO: The pharmacy market is aggressively moving online
text: Online pharmacy startup Capsule is looking to grow beyond its New York City roots. The company, which delivers prescription drugs to local patients in under two hours, recently raised $200 million in fundraising to expand to more cities across the U.S., and it's also the largest single venture financing in digital health. Capsule CEO Eric Kinariwala joins Invesco Vice Chair of Investments Krishna Memani, Quill Intelligence CEO and Chief Strategist Danielle DiMartino Booth, and Yahoo Finance's Adam Shapiro and Julie Hyman to discuss.
